note:
Your basic Bay Area boy: flâneur, film buff, hiker, foodie, culture vulture, PhD drop out—an underemployed and over-caffeinated “cultural Marxist” and sorta expat Aussie ("Frisco-Australian")

Liberté, Egalité, Flâneurité!

Born to Ngunnawal land, currently living on Ohlone land

[Alt text: avatar is a character from the Matt Groening comic, “School is Hell.” Banner is a photo of kids in Northern Ireland during the Troubles, the center one sticking out his tongue.]

fields.name: Areas
